nodes.bodyText: Although the user should not leave the port to empty, but we used to use the default 22 for empty port before my change. I think we should keep this behavior.

Hello, Pengyu. After testing with 7.3.1 which is before https://jira.talendforge.org/browse/TDI-42668,  I don't see the default value of the port in javajet, but I see the default value in XML file. And the exception is the same as before when the port is "" or null.
